data.name: Whisker Squadron
data.detailed_description:
Engage in epic aerial combat with your feline pilot of choice! You'll explore free-roaming space zones filled with adventure and opportunity


Take on a series of epic, procedurally-generated boss fights!


Fight your way through dynamic worlds in a mission that's unique every time you play it


Whisker Squadron is a roguelike shooter that plays out across land and space. Outfit your high tech ship with your feline pilot of choice, and choose your path through an ever-changing galaxy. Explore space for loot and opportunities, and try to survive epic trench run-style action sequences that take place on planets and vast enemy stations. Each run culminates in a procedurally generated boss fight that will surprise and challenge even the most experienced players. You might not survive your mission - but don’t worry, you’ll earn resources with each run that can be applied towards ship and pilot upgrades that will help you succeed next time!

Key Features


  • Procedurally generated, rogue-like mission structure that's unique every time you play
  • Incredible procedurally-generated bosses that make for an intense climax to every mission
  • Choose your pilots from a cast of 4 feline heroes
  • Daily challenges and leaderboards
  • Split screen co-op

data.short_description: An action-packed rogue-lite adventure across land and space. Explore space for loot and opportunity, and survive epic action sequences on planets and vast enemy stations. Spend your XP at the end of each run towards upgrades that will help you with your next try.
